name: MHTOCSMMSevereAnesthesiaComplications
title: MH TOC SMM ValueSet for the Severe Anesthesia Complications Indicator
description: A list of ICD-10-CM and ICD-9-CM diagnosis codes for the Severe Maternal Morbidity Severe Anesthesia Complications Indicator. The codes in the ValueSet should be monitored for changes as they vary by source and may be updated.
